discussion_comments.comment_body:
That level here imo gives no relevant info or context to the test name. It's just there because the higher level grouping requires it. Hence I wanted to get this as short as possible so it takes up as little space as possible. And I doubt you would ever search for this term. ;)

It's especially helpful in this view to give more space for the actual test name:
